query.select: (CASE UPPER(P.LABEL) WHEN 'HEADLINE_CUMULATIVE_LENGTH' THEN 'HEADLINE_LENGTH' WHEN 'SMALLER_MESH_GAUGE' THEN 'GEAR_LEGAL_MESH_SIZE' WHEN 'WING_LINE_FORM' THEN 'WING_LINE_CARAC' WHEN 'SELECTIVE_DEVICE' THEN 'SELECTIVE_DEVICE_1' WHEN 'SELECTIVITY_DEVICE' THEN 'SELECTIVE_DEVICE_1' ELSE P.LABEL END)
CASE P.IS_BOOLEAN WHEN TRUE THEN null ELSE PGM.NUMERICAL_VALUE END

CASE WHEN (P.IS_BOOLEAN AND PGM.NUMERICAL_VALUE = 1) THEN 'Oui' WHEN (P.IS_BOOLEAN AND PGM.NUMERICAL_VALUE = 0) THEN 'Non' WHEN (P.LABEL = UPPER('WING_LINE_FORM')) THEN QV.NAME ELSE COALESCE(QV.LABEL, QV.NAME) END
query.from: INNER JOIN OPERATION O ON O.ID = S.ID_OP
INNER JOIN PHYSICAL_GEAR PG ON PG.ID = O.PHYSICAL_GEAR_FK
LEFT OUTER JOIN PHYSICAL_GEAR_MEASUREMENT PGM ON PGM.PHYSICAL_GEAR_FK = PG.ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN PMFM ON PMFM.ID = PGM.PMFM_FK
LEFT OUTER JOIN PARAMETER P ON P.ID = PMFM.PARAMETER_FK
LEFT OUTER JOIN QUALITATIVE_VALUE QV ON QV.ID = PGM.QUALITATIVE_VALUE_FK
LEFT OUTER JOIN UNIT ON UNIT.ID = PMFM.UNIT_FK
LEFT OUTER JOIN MATRIX ON MATRIX.ID = PMFM.MATRIX_FK
LEFT OUTER JOIN FRACTION ON FRACTION.ID = PMFM.FRACTION_FK
LEFT OUTER JOIN METHOD ON METHOD.ID = PMFM.METHOD_FK

subquery.subselect: (CASE WHEN P.LABEL = UPPER('FAKE') THEN UPPER('TODO') ELSE P.LABEL END)
CASE P.IS_BOOLEAN WHEN TRUE THEN null ELSE PGM.NUMERICAL_VALUE END

CASE WHEN (P.IS_BOOLEAN AND PGM.NUMERICAL_VALUE = 1) THEN 'Oui' WHEN (P.IS_BOOLEAN AND PGM.NUMERICAL_VALUE = 0) THEN 'Non' WHEN (P.LABEL = UPPER('WING_LINE_FORM')) THEN QV.NAME ELSE COALESCE(QV.LABEL, QV.NAME) END
